He was three years abroad...."'' |- |[[Second Age 733|733]]||[[Tar-Aldarion|Aldarion]] returns to [[Númenor]]. |- |[[Second Age 735|735]]||[[Tar-Aldarion|Aldarion]] makes his third journey to [[Middle-earth]], visiting the coasts as far south as the [[Bay of Belfalas]].{{UT|Wife}}: ''"...and not long after another voyage he made, that lasted for four years...In the thirty-ninth year of his age Aldarion returned to Númenor...."'' |- |[[Second Age 739|739]]||[[Tar-Aldarion|Aldarion]] returns to [[Númenor]], bearing gifts from [[Gil-galad]] to his father [[Tar-Meneldur|Meneldur]]. |- |[[Second Age 740|740]]||[[Tar-Elendil]] surrenders the [[Sceptre of Númenor|Sceptre]]. |- |[[Second Age 820|820]]||[[Tar-Aldarion|Aldarion]] returns to [[Númenor]].
|- |[[Second Age 824|824]]||[[Tar-Meneldur]] rescinds [[Tar-Aldarion|Aldarion's]] authority.{{UT|Wife}}: ''"At the open rebellion of Aldarion the King rescinded his authority.... Five years passed; and Aldarion returned with nine ships...."'' [[Tar-Aldarion|Aldarion's]] five-year voyage. |- |[[Second Age 829|829]]||[[Tar-Aldarion|Aldarion]] returns and immediately sets out upon his fourteen-year voyage.
|- |[[Second Age 840|840]]||Birth of [[Nessanië]].
|- |[[Second Age 843|843]]||[[Tar-Aldarion|Aldarion]] returns to [[Númenor]]. [[Tar-Meneldur]] restores authority.{{UT|Wife}}: ''"Then Aldarion was chastened in mood, and he received the pardon of Meneldur, who restored to him the Lordship of the Ships and Havens...."'' |- |[[Second Age 850|850]]||[[Tar-Aldarion|Aldarion]] and [[Erendis]] sail to [[Andúnië]].{{UT|Wife}}: ''"At length he sought to persuade Erendis to sail with him on a voyage about the Island in the ship Eämbar; for one hundred years had now passed since Aldarion founded the Guild of Venturers...."'' |- |[[Second Age 852|852]]||Birth of [[Hallacar]].
|- |[[Second Age 858|858]]||[[Tar-Aldarion|Aldarion]] is betrothed to [[Erendis]].
|- |[[Second Age 861|861]]||[[Tar-Aldarion|Aldarion]] and [[Erendis]] forswear wedding until his return.{{UT|Wife}}: ''"More than three years have now passed'' [since the betrothal]'', and that is long enough.... 'It has come upon me again,'' Atarinya. ''Eighteen years'' [since last being at sea] ''is a long fast."'' |- |[[Second Age 863|863]]||[[Tar-Aldarion|Aldarion's]] six-year voyage.
|- |[[Second Age 869|869]]||[[Tar-Aldarion|Aldarion]] returns to [[Númenor]]. The first shadow appears on sailing to [[Middle-earth]]. |- |[[Second Age 870|870]]||Wedding of [[Tar-Aldarion|Aldarion]] and [[Erendis]]. |- |[[Second Age 873|873]]||Birth of [[Tar-Ancalimë|Ancalimë]].{{rp|VII}} |- |[[Second Age 877|877]]||[[Tar-Aldarion|Aldarion]]'s second five-year voyage, on the newly-made [[Hirilondë]]. |- |[[Second Age 880|880]]||[[Tar-Ancalimë|Ancalimë]] learns her father is Lord [[Tar-Aldarion|Aldarion]].{{UT|Wife}}: ''"But that year'' [the second after Aldarion's sailing] ''passed, and no sail was seen; and the next year came, and waned to autumn. ...But now Ancalimë was seven years old.... One day in the summer of that year a young boy...came to the house on an errand from one of the distant farms...."'' |- |[[Second Age 882|882]]||[[Tar-Aldarion|Aldarion]] returns.
